\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& A && B \\
	\\
	& C && D \\
	A && {B\oplus C} && D \\
	{H^{-1}(T)} && {H^0(T)} && {H^1(T)}
	\arrow["f", from=1-2, to=1-4]
	\arrow["h"', from=1-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\varphi }"{description}, from=1-2, to=3-4]
	\arrow["g", from=1-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["k"', from=3-2, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\binom{f}{h}}", from=4-1, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{(g,-k)}", from=4-3, to=4-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
